"The Rubber Duck Dilemma" - A story about a rubber duck who is trying to figure out his purpose in life and goes on a journey to discover his true identity.
"The Great Rubber Duck Adventure" - A game where players take on the role of a rubber duck and must navigate through different obstacles and challenges to reach the end of the game.
"The Rubber Duck Symphony" - A musical performance featuring a large ensemble of rubber ducks playing instruments made from recycled materials.
"The Rubber Duck Art Gallery" - An exhibition featuring artwork created by artists using rubber ducks as their medium.
"The Rubber Duck Cookbook" - A collection of recipes and cooking techniques using rubber ducks as the main ingredient.
